occupation: Educator, First Lady of the United States
achievements: First lady of the United States (2021-present)
Co-founder of the Biden Breast Health Initiative and the Jill Biden Foundation
Known for her neo soul music and spoken word poetry
Appeared in films like 'Why Did I Get Married?' and 'Baggage Claim'
First female executive editor of The New York Times (2011-2014)
Author of 'Merchants of Truth: The Business of News and the Fight for Facts'
